title: Boot Win7PE using USB on Intel Mac?

forumNotes.author: bPmNnptWnd3Z
forumNotes.content:
Hi, I'm new to this forum, so I apologize in advance if this is in the wrong section. I'm trying to boot Win7PE using a USB on a Mac that uses EFI. I do not want to use bootcamp or anything like that, I just want to boot it directly. And I've followed this [guide](http://tillmail.de/wordpress/436 "External link")(External Link) to boot Linux directly so I know its possible, It boots Ubuntu from an ISO, but that does not work for windows, Also I'd rather have the files directly on the USB instead of having in an ISO. So please can anyone help?


Thanks in advanced.
